## AbstractSet.add() method

Appends value to the set. Returns the set with added value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
add(element: E): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | E | The value of the element to add to the set. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
